dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1241 IH: Security And Fairness Enhancement for America Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Collins (for himself, Mr. Gill of Texas, Mr. Webster of Florida, Mr. Haridopolos, Mr. Tiffany, Mr. Nehls, and Mr. Ogles) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to eliminate the diversity immigrant program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as—

paragraph.text: the Security And Fairness Enhancement for America Act of 2025; or
the SAFE for America Act of 2025.

subsection.text: Section 203 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1153) is amended by striking subsection (c).
The Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1101 et seq.) is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 101(a)(15)(V), by striking section 203(d) and inserting section 203(c);

clause.text: in paragraph (1), by adding and at the end;
in paragraph (2), by striking ; and and inserting a period; and

subparagraph.text: in subsection (b)(2)(B)(ii)(IV), by striking section 203(b)(2)(B) each place such term appears and inserting clause (i);
by redesignating subsections (d), (e), (f), (g), and (h) as subsections (c), (d), (e), (f), and (g), respectively;
in subsection (c), as redesignated, by striking subsection (a), (b), or (c) and inserting subsection (a) or (b);
in subsection (e), as redesignated, by striking subsection (a), (b), or (c) of this section and inserting subsection (a) or (b);
in subsection (f), as redesignated, by striking subsections (a), (b), and (c) and inserting subsections (a) and (b); and

clause.text: by striking (d) each place such term appears and inserting (c); and
in paragraph (2)(B), by striking subsection (a), (b), or (c) and inserting subsection (a) or (b);

subparagraph.text: in subsection (e), by striking subsection (a), (b), or (c) of section 203 and inserting subsection (a) or (b) of section 203; and

clause.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking section 203 (a) or (d) and inserting subsection (a) or (c) of section 203; and
in subparagraph (C), by striking section 203(d) and inserting section 203(c);

paragraph.text: in section 214(q)(1)(B)(i), by striking section 203(d) and inserting section 203(c);
in section 216(h)(1), in the undesignated matter following subparagraph (C), by striking section 203(d) and inserting section 203(c); and
in section 245(i)(1)(B), by striking section 203(d) and inserting section 203(c).

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall take effect on October 1, 2025.
